item.title: STUDY: 28% of delivery drivers have eaten your food...
item.description:
wset.com
(WSET) -- Ever wondered if a delivery driver took a bite of your food while on delivery? A new study says your fears might be real. A new study done by US Food shows the habits of both customers and delivery drivers. The study shows 28 percent of delivery drivers have taken food from a customer's order. 54 percent of delivery drivers polled also said they are often tempted by the smell of the food they deliver to customers.
